hitSide

public void hitSide(FlxObject Contact,
                    float Velocity)
Description copied from class: FlxObject
Since most games have identical behavior for running into walls, you can just override this function instead of overriding both hitLeft and hitRight.

Overrides:
hitSide in class FlxObject
Parameters:
Contact - The FlxObject you just ran into.
Velocity - The suggested new velocity for this object.
